name: WordGuru
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word guru
des:
Improve your vocabulary! Listen to the word's definition and spelling. 

Challenge your friends and try to listen to as many words as you can to top the leaderboard. 

Premium content: Get access to 4000 more words.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
